name: mystical-fire
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.x-y: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
